rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area facing the garden with ample natural light.

vastu.significance: Promotes positive energy and social interaction.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with efficient layout, positioned near the dining area.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: A multifunctional studio space serving as bedroom and work area.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet study area with bookshelves along one wall.

rooms.name: Closet/Storage
rooms.description: Adjacent to bedroom for convenience and order.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing North for auspicious entry.
Large window in the living room to allow ample daylight.
Access door to the garden from living room.
Stairs leading to the rooftop terrace.

vastu.significance: Provides balance between indoor and outdoor spaces.

garden.description: Expansive garden surrounding the studio, with a mix of greenery and patio seating areas.

vastu.significance: Enhances overall energy flow and relaxation.

rooftop_terrain.description: Rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and space for leisure.

vastu.significance: Balances the energy of the home with external nature.

levels.notes: The design adheres to local building norms and incorporates Vastu principles for optimal energy flow. The layout emphasizes natural light and integrates indoor-outdoor connectivity through garden access and a rooftop terrace.
